CustomField.label: What could we have done to WIN this opty

value.fullName: If we had a feature that the customer needed (fill in what feature was needed)
value.label: If we had a feature that the customer needed (fill in what feature was needed)

value.fullName: If the product demo was smoother

value.fullName: If the customer had a better initial experience with the product (trial)
value.label: If the customer had a better initial experience with the product (trial)

value.label: If we had a better relationship with the champion or partner/agent

value.fullName: If we could have made the customer more comfortable changing from their existing service
value.label: If we could have made the customer more comfortable changing from their existing service

value.label: If our sales process was quicker/smoother (quote, contract, etc)

value.fullName: Don’t know. The customer just stopped replying
